name: Nonoglyph
description:
Nonoglyph is a relaxing exploration-puzzle game.

The Witness was a big inspiration behind the environment and style of Nonoglyph, with Picross/Nonogram puzzles being the basis of the puzzles themselves. 

This is intended to help teach players new to Picross/Nonoglyph puzzles. The puzzle mechanics and hints work in a way to help a beginner learn the rules without explicit tutorials. 

Please note there is no save state between sessions in this build!
